concept.definition: The medication is available for use.
The medication is not available for use.
The medication was entered in error.

description: A coded concept defining if the medication is in active use.
name: MedicationKnowledgeStatus

text.div:
MedicationKnowledgeStatus

A coded concept defining if the medication is in active use.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/medicationKnowledge-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
active ActiveThe medication is available for use.
inactive InactiveThe medication is not available for use.
entered-in-error Entered in ErrorThe medication was entered in error.

title: MedicationKnowledgeStatus
